expo.name: HairSnap

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: HairSnap needs access to your camera to take photos of your hair for tracking purposes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: HairSnap needs access to your photo library to save and access hair photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: HairSnap needs permission to save photos to your photo library.

plugins.cameraPermission: HairSnap needs access to your camera to take photos of your hair for tracking purposes.

plugins.photosPermission: HairSnap needs access to your media library to save and access hair photos.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: HairSnap needs permission to save photos to your media library.

expo.description: HairSnap helps you track and monitor hair loss over time with easy photo comparisons and progress tracking.
